name: Climby
description:
Hello Welcome to my game!

Please download it and try it.

Enjoy/

This is a game where you need to climb the Mountain .

You are a ball with a hammer.

With the hammer you pull yourself up the mountain, trying to reach the top.

Thanks alot for visiting this page!

For tutorials visit my playlist on my YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLvIStBpKe1fQmvbw6Kb5t1SyjmurvwWSI
